Open.definition: exposed to general view or knowledge

2 a.definition: to make the statement by which the trial of (a case) is begun and put before the court

sub_terms.b: to be the first to speak in summing up or arguing (a case)

3.definition: to restore or recall (as an order, rule, or judgment) from a finally determined state to a state in which the parties are free to prosecute or oppose by further proceedings
